name: Squid Game fan-game {Demo access}
description:
This is just a fun project i decided to do...

Since squid game was released, I thought to myself...

"Hm... If there is Danganronpa fangames, FNAF fangames and other fan games with it's own story and characters... Why isn't there any about squid game?(idk if there is, but I couldn't find one.)"

So I decided to make my own! :D

The game won't be 100% identical to the series, because that will be boring... So I decided to add "new things" that will be shown in chapter 1...

So wait for that! :D

For now have fun with the Demo! ^^

Also sorry for being so late couldn't start doing the project 'cause I had some problems with it and alot of thinking about it and bla bla bla...

And English is not my first language so there might be some grammar errors or something... :<
